I just pray that whatever it is its benign. Im a single mom with a 6 year old son and all I keep thinking about is him

Posts.Content: Jun 25, 2009 11:49AM Superwoman808 wrote: OMG!!! i'm also only 24 and have been diagnosed with breast cancer in my right breast!  i don't know what to do!  LUMPECTOMY+ RADIATION or BILATERAL MASTECTOMY+RECON???  i just completed radiation treatment in my groin/thigh area in february for sarcoma and just last month was told i have bc!  good grief!  i've tested negative for the p53 gene mutation, and am now awaiting results on the BRCA (i have no family history of breast cancer)... my problem is is that i don't have time to wait for the results...  what have you decided to do DiamondGurl... oh, and id love to get some guidance from everyone else too...  Thanks and God Bless us all!
Posts.Title: Bilateral Mastectomy DiamondGurl Superwoman808
